name: Passwordless Demo
description: This app is a simple implementation of passwordless authentication using Go.

DEBUG.description: Enable debug mode for logging SQL and http traffic.

AUTH_KEY.description: A random string for use with gorilla session.

ENCRYPT_KEY.description: A random string for use with gorilla session. Should be length 16, 24, or 32.

EMAIL_FROM.description: The email to use as the sender for verification emails.
